messages.title: DEMANDING BETTER FOR SITTINGBOURNE & SHEPPEY
messages.content: Ben J Martin fighting for our area.

messages.title: Build a Brighter Future
messages.content: Invest in our NHS and social care by putting a penny on income tax. Invest in new zero carbon homes for social rent that local people can afford. Fighting to prevent climate change and improve our environment.

messages.title: OUR CHANCE FOR CHANGE
messages.content: We are committed to securing the future of the NHS.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest by putting a penny on income tax. Employ 20,000 more nurses and 10,000 more NHS mental health professionals.
Investing in new zero carbon homes for social rent so genuinely affordable houses can be available and to help prevent climate change.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Vote for Liberal Democrats over Conservatives to fight for local people and against NHS cuts, oppose Brexit.

issues.brexitEurope: Revoke article 50 to end the Brexit nightmare.
issues.economy: Invest in zero carbon homes to stimulate local economy.
issues.health: Committed to securing the future of the NHS.

housing.content: Building new zero carbon homes for local people so genuinely affordable houses can be available and to help prevent climate change.

politicalExperience.role: Member of Swale Borough's coalition cabinet
politicalExperience.achievements: Pushing for cross-party agreement for local residents. Working to deliver affordable housing for local people.

Ben J Martin listening to a local person.
Graphic comparing BEN J MARTIN | LIBERAL DEMOCRAT to MORE CONSERVATIVE CUTS.
